title: Abarth Simca 1300
content:
Anyone know what typeface, or similar, for this delicious piece of type?

Thx.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [tumblr\_ls0379nyBf1qau50i.jpeg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015112733/http:/typophile.com/files/tumblr_ls0379nyBf1qau50i.jpeg) | 159.34 KB |
author: smltypophile

comments.content: Granby is about as similar as I can guess at. and the zeros are not really very close.
Yeah it's the zeros, the C and the M that I'm after!

Sorry, don't know this one. A solution would be to consider letters and digits could come from different fonts.  
Some I like: [Monod](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015112733/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/monod) (main difference is /1 and /3 but easily editable), [Erbar Neo Mini](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015112733/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/erbar-neo-mini), [Nevis](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015112733/http:/tenbytwenty.com/?xxxx_posts=nevis), [Kessel 105](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015112733/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/talbot/kessel-105), [Git](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015112733/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/borutta/git), [Lito](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015112733/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/borutta/lito), [Neuzeit Grotesk](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015112733/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/neuzeit-grotesk), [Diamonds](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015112733/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/hvdfonts/diamonds), [Planeta](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015112733/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/downloads/gestalten/planeta_ot), [Alumia](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015112733/http:/www.tendollarfonts.com/alumia), [Throne Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015112733/http:/www.tendollarfonts.com/throne-gothic), [Report School](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015112733/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/typodermic/report-school), [Ealing](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015112733/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/ealing), [Damian](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015112733/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/i-can-be-your-type/damian), [Nanami](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015112733/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/thinkdust/nanami), [Ziamimi](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015112733/http:/www.typographyserved.com/gallery/ZIAMIMI-DAMIER-Free-Font/4154989)
Lovely thankyou. If anyone else has any clues, please contribute :)
